body.name: E-YOOSO Wireless Mouse, Computer Mouse 18 Months Battery Life Cordless Mouse, 5 Level 4800 DPI, 6 Button Ergo Wireless Mice, 2.4G Portable USB Wireless Mouse for Laptop, Mac, Chromebook, PC, Windows
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 50 mins
features: ✅ 5-LEVEL ADJUSTABLE DPI: 1️⃣ 5-level DPI settings (800/1200/1600/2000/4800) to meet your multiple needs, either for daily work or gaming. The factory default is 1200DPI, with DPI gear indication,which will indicated the current DPI gear speed by LED flash times (1/2/3/4/5 times). 2️⃣ 2 kind polling rate adjustment :125Hz/250Hz，the factory default is 125Hz. Press the right button + the middle buttom for 3 seconds to switch (during the switching process, LED will flash 5 times).

✅ USB PLUG AND PLAY & STABLE CURSOR: USB Nano Receiver can be stored within the back of the mouse, can suport usb plug and play. Besides, 2.4GHz Wireless provides a powerful, reliable connection, transmission distance up to 33ft (10m) .Which eliminated delays, interference, accurate orbit & fast data transmission . Great wireless mouse for home and office.

✅ ANTI-SLIP & ANTI-SWEAT ERGONOMIC DESIGN: E-YOOSO Ergonomic Mouse is made of anti-slip and anti-sweat custom material, super durable. E-1010 Ergonomic PC mouse with backward and forward button, make your web surfing more efficient, and perfect performance for more than 5,000,000 keystrokes!

✅ 18 MONTHS BATTERY LIFE & POWER SAVING MODE: E-YOOSO Wireless mouse with 18 months battery life. The wireless mouse with smart auto sleep mode, when lower power consumption, the mouse will enter the automatic sleep state to save power if you don‘t use it for 8 minutes,then click mouse runs on again.

✅ UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY & WIDE USE: The wireless optical MacBook mouse is compatible with Windows 11, 10, 8.1, 8, 7, XP, Vista, Linux, Chromebook, Mac OS(Side buttons are not available on Mac), Surface Pro, Surface, and Any Device with USB Ports. As well as compatible for PC, Laptop, MacBook and more. Great optical computer mice for various activities!
body.description: WHY CHOOSE E-YOOSO ? Are you still troubled when using others mouse? Others wireless mouse issue: The fingers feel painful after whole-day work.Others wireless mouse: Inefficient due to insensitive & unaccurate transmission. Need to install various drivers on computerFast battery lost for high power consumption. The following are the ascendancy between E-YOOSO Mouse and other Mouse : E-YOOSO wireless mice is Full-size ergonomic design, providing lasting comfort when gripping the mouse long and intense. 2.4GHz wireless technology, stable and accurate transmission with 33ft long range transmission distance. No need install any drivers, only need 2 steps: USB plug and play. Auto-enters power-saving mode when 8 mins no-operation, extend battery life to 18 months, super energy saving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All Day Comfort and Productivity
reviews.reviewText: This Bluetooth mouse is the most comfortable mouse I have used. I know there are far more expensive options that an extreme Ergonomic design. However, my hand rests perfectly with this mouse and clicking functions is seamless with the design. I have noticed I can work for much longer without my hands becoming sore. I use this for remote office work, and online school. There is no issue with speed and the long battery life is amazing due to its sleep mode technology that is a simple click to wake up. The wake up is instant and I have never had issues with delays.Highly recommend to anyone looking for what I argue some of the best value you will be able to find.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the price
reviews.reviewText: The mouse works as advertised. Easy to install and use. No problems with it. I like the sleep mode.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Feel, Performance & Price
reviews.reviewText: After my beloved Logitech M35 reached the end of its life cycle, I settled on cheap little mini mice to get by, until I couldn't take it anymore. So I nabbed this unknown (to me) brand mouse based on its features, looks and user reviews. The price point sealed the deal, it's quite a steal. It feels feather-light until you insert a single AA battery, which helps give it a little heft. The ergonomic style is totally Logitech, but that's good. Feels very comfortable, all buttons accessible with ease. I have medium-sized hands and it's a perfect fit, not too small, not too big. I also chose this mouse because I wanted two side buttons (forward & back navigation), which I use a lot. Finally, this mouse features 5 selectable DPI modes, changed via a button on top. Great for precision cursor movement, ie Photoshop, etc. Excellent purchase, very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mouse for the money!
reviews.reviewText: After having tried two different bluetooth mouses unsuccessfully, I decided to go back to a USB mouse instead. The E-YOOSO got very good reviews, so I gave it a try. It arrived the next day, and synced up easily. It feels good to the touch, is responsive, and goes into the sleep mode after eight minutes of non use. Overall, I'm very satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mouse feels really good in the hand. Mouse moves smoothly on the mouse pad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well with my laptop.
reviews.reviewText: This mouse works perfect and connected immediately to my laptop. I am old-fashioned and need a mouse for all of my computer work. It is a bit larger than I like, but that is just because I have small hands. Has lasted a few months already.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This was an amazing price and so far I’ve been very pleased with it. Very comfortable on my hand since I work from home and I’m on the computer all day. Super easy to use and I have no complaints! I would definitely buy this mouse again in the future if I needed to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mouse is very light and plasticky. A good mouse will have a little 'heft' to it. After dropping it from my desk one time (less than 3 feet and onto an area rug), it broke and no longer works. I've dropped pretty much every mouse I've ever owned multiple times each and none have simply failed like this one did.Very disappointed.UPDATEThe same day this review was posted, the seller reached out with a solution. I was really surprised at how quickly they were there to help with my issue. I upgraded my 2-star review to a 3-star review for now. Once their resolution is complete, I will re-evaluate and revise my review accordingly.Customer service is huge in my book, so while I had an issue with the product, I am impressed with the service aspect

Die mouse ist ausgesprochen launisch. An manchen Tagen funktioniert sie gut, an anderen reagiert die sehr zögerlich.Ich würde die nicht nochmal kaufen.Update: ich habe den Verkäufer kontaktiert, der mir eine neue mouse zur Verfügung gestellt hat. Scheinbar war meine erste Defekt.Die neue mouse funktioniert einwandfrei
Fijne muis op batterijen.... niet opladen oid.... doet t gewoon altijd....

reviews.reviewTitle: Sehr Nützlich, und tut was man erwartet von einer Maus!
reviews.reviewText: Sehr Nützlich, und tut was man erwartet von einer Maus!
Nutze sie am Notebook. Funktioniert einwandfrei. Preiswert.

Die Mouse liegt gut in der Hand und macht was sie soll. Gut finde ich auch, dass die Mouse keinen Ein- Ausschalter hat. Meine Vorgängermouse hatte noch einen extra Ein- Ausschalter. Hier aktiviert man die Mouse mit der linken Mousetaste. Würde ich wieder kaufen.
